title: Miss Fisher's Murder Mysteries (Series 03) [promotional trailer]
creator_credit: Fiona Eagger, Deb Cox, Screen Australia and Every Cloud Productions
brief_description: Get a glimpse of Series Three with this short promotional trailer. Intrigue, murder, mystery and a sense of style and flair we see hints of the 2015 Series in this fast paced colourful trailer.
creator_credit_for_label: Fiona Eagger, Deb Cox, Screen Australia and Every Cloud Productions
